job.title: Data Analyst, ICQA
job.description:
Description      ESSENTIAL JOB DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES*        - Effectively identify and communicate analytical findings and trends to drive business changes that improve the customer experience and journey.   
  - Data validation, mining, and discovery.   
  - Perform ad-hoc analysis and provide business leaders actionable insights as needed.   
  - Write SQL queries.   
  - Creation of reports and dashboards utilizing Excel and Power Bi.   
  - Collaborate with the BI team to support reporting efforts for the ICQA team.   
  - Identify and define KPIs.         
BASIC AND PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS (EDUCATION And/or EXPERIENCE)        - Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, IT, Information Systems, Math, Statistics, or quantitative discipline with 2+ years of professional experience in Analytics/Business Intelligence.   
  - Experience in inventory control or fulfillment centers a plus.   
  - Experience working with complex data in large corporate environment a plus.   
  - A self-starter mentality and ability to operate within a fast-paced and ambiguous environment.   
  - Data visualization tools such as Power BI, Tableau, and SQL.   
  - Proficiency in SQL query building and report writing.   
  - Strong SQL knowledge including but not limited to; complex queries, CTEs, temp tables, stored procedures, cursors.   
  - Advanced in MS Excel including VLOOKUPs, pivot tables, charts, Power Query, index matches
